recipesJson.name: My Watermelon Juice
recipesJson.author: trandism
recipesJson.description: Friends were always asking for something good on this profile that is not single-dimensional and not overwhemingly sweet. After experimenting with all kinds of boosters I finally settled on the Cactus+Cantaloupe+Cucumber combination. The melon stone was pretty much settled from the beginning. Yakima Hops does wonders in this profile.
